name: The Comedy In Our Stars
description:
Utama is a student at a local university. The world is roughly set in the 1980s. While he is going for a Business degree, he doesn't know what he really wants to do. He stumbles through life, just getting by. He overthinks everything and can over react as well.

He means well, but tends to cause some chaos along the way. Follow him on his journey with his friends, pets, and others. There are a few options throughout so you can influence the story. The story takes place over a couple of days in the life of Utama.

Please let me know what you thought and if you have any feedback, I'd love to hear from you!
Thanks for reading and I hope you enjoy and especially laugh!

WARNING: Contains mild swearing

PS. I ran out of time so I didn't end up making nicer backgrounds or finish all the touch-ups I wanted to. That's the price I pay for procrastinating I guess!
